CustomField.formula:
IF(AND( OR(RecordTypeId = "012700000001U2v",RecordTypeId="012700000001U2w",RecordTypeId="012700000001U2x",RecordTypeId="01270000000HgOc"), Account.Enterprise_Hub_Client_Indicator__c =TRUE, TEXT( Status )<>"Reference Parent Case", IsClosed =FALSE),"Open Onboarding Cases",
IF(AND(OR(RecordTypeId = "012700000001U2v",RecordTypeId="012700000001U2w",RecordTypeId="012700000001U2x",RecordTypeId="01270000000HgOc"), Account.Enterprise_Hub_Client_Indicator__c=TRUE,IsClosed =TRUE),"Closed Onboarding Cases",""))
CustomField.label: Onboarding Cases
